actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to increase the rates of educational assistance, to otherwise improve the educational assistance program, and to establish a Vietnam-Era Veterans' Communication Center for the purposes of improving the effectiveness of Veterans' Administration programs for making veterans aware of benefits and services available to them under the veterans laws.

summary.text: Increases the rates of educational assistance payable to veterans. Establishes Vietnam Era Veterans Communication Center within the Veterans' Administration for the purpose of improving the effectiveness of Veterans' Administration programs for making veterans aware of benefits and services available to them under the veterans laws.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to increase the rates of educational assistance, to otherwise improve the educational assistance program, and to establish a Vietnam-Era Veterans' Communication Center for the purposes of improving the effectiveness of Veterans' Administration programs for making veterans aware of benefits and services available to them under the veterans laws.
